description.message:
Welcome to the Admissions Connect Chatbot installer!

For installation details, see the [Admissions Connect Documentation](https://powerofus.force.com/s/article/AC-Documentation).

IMPORTANT: Salesforce does not recommend installing directly in production organizations. Instead, install in one of your free sandbox environments, or a developer organization first.
